item.description:
Please join us for the Couch to 5K Graduation Run.  This is a great event and a very well organized race.  All details below are from the funds website.  Online registration is available (for an additional fee) but you are able to download the mail in registration form as well.

The race begins at 9am on Saturday September 18th. 

**PARKING FILLS UP QUICKLY!***
I listed the event time for 8am.  This gives time to meet, pick up your number and Tshirt, stop in the bathrooms before the lines are long, walk around and stretch, all without any stress of missing the starting gun.  Plus, this early you can actually get a parking space at the Woodsdale School. 

Hope you call can make this great event and stay around for a fun after race party. 

The Jeff Coombs Memorial Road Race and Family Walk
Sunday, September 18, 2011 – 9:00am
Each September the Foundation sponsors the Jeff Coombs Memorial Road Race and Family Walk, raising about $40-50,000 annually.  The 5K road race/walk has become a highly anticipated event in the town and is well known beyond the streets of Abington.  Participants to the event have come from cities throughout the state, as well as New Hampshire, New Jersey, Arizona and Washington, D.C./Virginia.

The Tenth Annual Road Race is Sunday, September 18, beginning at 9 a.m. at the Woodsdale School in Abington.  The children’s fun race is at 8:30.  Download an application here or register on www.coolrunning.com.  Registration is $17 before Aug. 31 ($20 Sept. 1 on), $12 for students 13-18, and $5 for children 12 and under. T-shirts guaranteed to all registrants with entries post-marked by August 31. If you’re able to come to the Woodsdale School on Saturday, September 17 between 4-5 p.m., you can avoid the morning rush and pick up your number and t-shirt then. As always, thanks for supporting this fun event!

For additional details: http://jeffcoombsfund.org/race.html

 

As always, meetup, group organizers, event staff and location are not responsible for any injuries.  Please refer back to meetups release all members agree to when joining.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet outside the front door of the school. I'll also give out my cell # for those attending closer to the event.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Jeff Coombs Memorial Road Race & Family Walk aka C25K "Graduation" 5K Run
